properties.entry: SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICE_NO , NOTICE_DATE , ADMIN_ID , NOTICE_TITLE , NOTICE_FIX FROM NOTICE N JOIN ADMIN AD ON N.ADMIN_NO = AD.ADMIN_NO WHERE N.NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'Y'
